title: Great Fit and Protection
content: So comfortable. The actual tampon and even the applicator are super comfortable to use. No pulling tugging at the skin at all. They are shaped in a way that molds to your body. Less leaks is always a plus. I love that this box comes in three sizes that I need. My period is either ON or REALLY ON. Not much in between. So having a box that caters to my specific needs without having to buy multiple boxes or sizes I won't use is amazing. They travel well and fit in a purse pocket or cosmetics bag. Makes life so much easier to have a few of these in hand.
